DOC.brief_summary: The objective study assess immunogenicity safety among three different lot inactivate influenza vaccine ( whole virion , Vero cell-derived ) Day 21 Day 180 vaccination .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Safety Immune Response Three Different Lots Influenza Vaccine Made New Manufacturing Process With Vaccine Made Traditional Manufacturing Process Season 2004/2005
DOC.criteria: Male female subject eligible participation study : > = 18 < = 60 year old day screening ( Stratum A ) ; > 60 year old day screening ( Stratum B ) ; clinically healthy ( physical condition physician would reservations vaccinate influenza vaccine outside scope clinical study ) ; reliably keep daily record symptom ; understand nature study , agree provision , give write informed consent ; female capable bearing child negative pregnancy test ( urine ) result study entry agree employ adequate birth control measure duration study . Subjects exclude participation study : receive influenza vaccine 2003/2004 season and/or 2004/2005 season ; suffer kind immunodeficiency ; suffer disease ( e.g . autoimmune disease ) undergo form treatment ( e.g . systemic corticosteroid , chemotherapeutics ) expect influence normal immunologic function ; history inflammatory degenerative neurological disease ( e.g . Guillain Barr√© , multiple sclerosis ) ; receive blood transfusion immunoglobulin within 30 day study entry ; donate blood plasma within 30 day study entry ; history vaccinerelated contraindicate event ( e.g . anaphylaxis known contraindication ) ; rash dermatological condition may interfere injection site reaction rating ; know suspect problem drug alcohol abuse ; unable lead independent life either physically mentally ; administer investigational drug within six week prior study entry ; concurrently participate clinical study include administration investigational product ; female , pregnant lactating .
